Google Analytics.name: Google Analytics
Google Analytics.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

Hotjar.name: Hotjar

Amplitude.name: Amplitude
Amplitude.description: Amplitude is a web and mobile analytics solution with cross-platform user journey tracking, user behavior analysis and segmentation capabilities.

It helps marketing and sales teams identify their ideal customers visiting their website and gives them the insights they need to generate more qualified leads, make prospecting more efficient and close more deals.
